text: Joaqu√≠n Rafael Phoenix () (born October 28, 1973), originally called Leaf Phoenix, is an American actor. He is from a family of actors, like his brother, the late actor River Phoenix. He has been nominated four times for the Academy Award, winning once in 2020. He also won the Golden Globe, Screen Actors Guild, BAFTA and Grammy Awards. Phoenix is popular for his roles as Commodus in Gladiator, as Johnny Cash in Walk the Line and as the main character in Joker. He is also known for portraying firefighter Jack Morrison in Ladder 49. He has recently begun directing music videos, as well as producing movies and television shows. He also sang and recorded an album, the soundtrack Walk The Line, which won a Grammy Award. He has been a social activist for a long time, especially for animal rights. He is a vegan. == Other websites == * * Joaquin Phoenix interview for Walk the Line *Joaquin Phoenix Category:Actors who played the Joker Category:Best Actor Academy Award winners Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:American political activists Category:American animal rights activists Category:American child actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American movie actors Category:Humanitarians Category:American philanthropists Category:American movie producers Category:Jewish American actors Category:Actors from San Juan, Puerto Rico
title: Joaquin Phoenix
